sections.heading: Computation of time by monthsIf the prescriptive period consists of one or more months, prescription accrues upon the expiration of the day of the last month of the period that corresponds with the date of the commencement of prescription, and if there is no corresponding day, prescription accrues u
sections.text: Computation of time by monthsIf the prescriptive period consists of one or more months, prescription accrues upon the expiration of the day of the last month of the period that corresponds with the date of the commencement of prescription, and if there is no corresponding day, prescription accrues upon the expiration of the last day of the period.Acts 1982, No. 187, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1983.
